snippet.title: Seneca 7 - The Alpha Prologue | Teaser
snippet.description:
We're experimenting with a new way to develop videogames with Seneca 7's The Alpha Prologue.

Play the demo now
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1901860/Seneca_7_A_Cyberpunk_Odyssey/

As we develop the game we have created an episodic game that takes place as the settlers first leave Earth and head to their new home on Seneca 7. Download the demo for free today and start playing and unlocking steam achievements to earn in-game rewards for the final release of the game.
